TopicTitle: Not just flight crew managment but engineering staff too

Articles.Content:
I think we should care more about the ground crew.

So for every project you need to hire a rocket engineer, a construction worker, a marketing manager and so on. They can influence the needed science points, the cost of parts, increase the budget or reputation.

I don't really work out the details, but i belive the basic idea is good.

What do you think?

I think some of this tycoon stuff is coming much later in development. I'm not sure its for everyone but I do love games like Airline Tycoon & management type of things. It's definitely not what the development needs currently though. But I'm sure a lite version of this will come along nearer to version 1.00.

You are right, this is not the most important thing at the moment, but it would be great to know what is the concept about the managment part of the game.

I heard that Buzz Aldrin's Race Into Space is the main inspiration, but this is too vague for me:)
